column2: "Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones. My fears were completely unfounded, then."
"Finding friends with the ARKS Search feature, buying and selling via My Shop..."
"Believe you me, skillful use of Visiphones can help make you a top-notch ARKS."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time back in the day, when I used a Visiphone to..."
